item.title: 泛型、特性与生命周期
item.description: 第10章 泛型、特性与生命周期 0 前言 0.0 重复的代码 fn main() { let number_list = vec![34, 50, 25, 100, 65]; let mut largest = number_list[0]; for number in number_list { if number > largest { largest = number; } } println!("The largest number is {}", largest); let number_list = vec![102, 34, 6000, 89, 54, 2, 43,
